name: Peels
desc: Find a home for your food scraps, wherever you are.

name: Attie
desc: Answers the age-old question “who played overnight?” without revealing the scores.

name: Ephemera
desc: You know those scraps of paper and receipts that clog up your wallet and pockets? This is a living, digital archive of that.

name: Pi Frame
desc: Print your own changing picture frame using an e-ink display and Raspberry Pi.
Kevin Kelly's 68 Bits of Unsolicited Advice, one at a time.
